BB Latest trial scheduling decision by Judge Wu is a wise and a just oneHe is basically saying the case is not center around an expert witness They are replaceableAlso the expert witness conflicting schedule was brought up after Judge Wu made a wise proposed schedule He saw the ganging up of the two sides FB SNAP stacking up their combined schedule conflict to move the trial date further out as much as they can as another delay tactic So Judge Wu proposed two separate trials Willing to spend more of his time on the caseSNAP panicked that they have to go first before FB So they introduced the conflicted expert witness schedule Judge Wu been around the blocks with defense lawyers He stuck to his proposed schedule Judge Wu is wiseThe average time duration from start to trial for this district is two years So the timing is right on Not shorter and not longer So keep that in mind The case is going well
